publicParcel.title: Qaadashada Xirmada Cuntada
publicParcel.qrCodeDescription: Tus koodkan QR markaad qaadanayso xirmadaada cuntada

statusDescription.scheduled: Qaadashidaadu waa la qorsheeyay. Fadlan imaada waqtiga qaadashada.
statusDescription.ready: Xirmadaada cuntada hadda diyaar bay u tahay in la qaado!
statusDescription.collected: Xirmadan cuntada mar hore baa la qaaday.
statusDescription.expired: Qaadashidan mar dambe ma aha mid sax ah. Fadlan kala soo xidhiidh shaqaalaha haddii aad qabto su'aalo.
statusDescription.cancelled: Qaadashadan waa la joojiyay. Uma baahnid inaad timaaddo.

parcel.ready: Diyaar u ah in la qaato
